lead_paragraph: The Commerce Department declined, however, to rule on claims that China’s undervalued currency amounted to an unlawful subsidy.
snippet: The Commerce Department declined, however, to rule on claims that China’s undervalued currency amounted to an unlawful subsidy.

headline.main: China Illegally Subsidized Aluminum Products, U.S. Rules
